title: Dr. Dre - The Chronic - DualDisc Enhanced Stereo 24 bit FLAC Rip
description:
The Chronic 2005 Enhanced Stereo 24 bit 48kHz DualDisc version in 24 bit FLAC.


I ripped it straight off the DVD side of the DualDisc. It was all one big WAV file so 

I had to slice it up as individual tracks. Added all the metadata myself :)

Album cover is inside the archive, I forgot to put it inside the actual folder but
